description: Expansion of sum(q^n / product( 1-q^k, k=1..n+4), n=0..inf).
maple: ZL :=[S, {S = Set(Cycle(Z),3 < card)}, unlabelled]: seq(combstruct[count](ZL, size=n), n=4..41); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Mar 25 2008B:=[S,{S = Set(Sequence(Z,1 <= card),card >=4)},unlabelled]: seq(combstruct[count](B, size=n), n=4..41);# [From _Zerinvary Lajos_, Mar 21 2009]
